Description: Fragment of flattened handle at neck join of a Knidian pottery transport amphora. Clay medium red-brown. Oval stamp with amphora symbol.
Type series: Close to KT2372 (Virginia Grace's unpublished K(nidian) T(ype) series)
Curator's comments: Name Apollonios? No parallel is apparent for such a round stamp.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (313)
